resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Video is not playing when play button is pressed for the first time.It maximizes the screen but the video doesn't start playing.

This is not a regression.It even occurs on 2.1.0.GA

Steps To Reproduce:

1. Run the Kitchen Sink application
2. Tap on Base UI>Views>Web Views>HTML5 Video
3. Press the "Play" button.
4. Press the done button and and Press the Play button again

Actual Result:
After Step 3:The screen gets maximised but video is not played
After Step 4: The screen gets maximised and the video also starts playing

Expected Result:
After Step 3: Video should start playing
After Step 4: Video should start playing
fields.summary: iOS : Kitchen Sink - Video is not playing when play button is pressed for the first time.
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.3.v20120915120319
iOS Device: iPhone 4s(5.1)
OS: Mac OSX 10.8.1
